hero_header: Seamless care that revolves around you
hero_caption:
Don’t delay needed care. Your safety is our top priority
Reserve an automated Covid-19 Test now
symptoms-caption: COVID-19 affects different people in different ways. Most infected people will develop mild to moderate illness and recover without hospitalization.
reservation-steps-header: Reserve a checkup in three simple steps!
reservation-steps-paragraph: reserving a covid-19 checkup in AutoClinic isn't that hard, the following simple steps illustrates how you can reserve a checkup
frequently-asked-questions-paragraph: You may have some questions in your mind about AutoClinic, We have collected the most frequently asked questions from our customers in one place where our new visitors can get to know us more.
step-1-paragraph: If it is your first time to register in AutoClinic, we will ask you some simple questions about your medical history to help our AI decide what is best treatment for your case
step-2-paragraph: the system will follow up with you, and will ask you some simple questions about the symptoms you are experiencing, and if our algorithm suspects that you are infected by Covid-19 the AI will automatically reserve you a checkup at the nearest AutoClinic center to your location.
step-3-paragraph: Then we will be very happy to welcome you as a guest at the nearest AutoClinic center to your location so our robots will do the necessary tests on you and aid you with the needed care
